title: LF DUO PARTNER FOR RANK
body: LF DUO PARTNER TO DUO WITH IM CURRENTLY SILVER 2 AND GONNA GRIND TO CLIMB SO IM LOOKING FOR A MID/TOP PLAYER WHO CAN HOLD THERE OWN LANE AND IS VERY GOOD WITH COMMUNICATION TO LEAD TEAM TO VICTORY I MAIN JG AND AD SUMMNER NAME- Dirty Viper21

replies.body:
Mid Lane main here.
Climbed from b5 to s5 from the start of placements till two days ago. I'm friendly imo the only time I'm toxic is when I'm tilted and I usually stop playing when I am. If you need me to tryhard, I'll tryhard. Feel free to add me :D
